body_html: @soumith Yes, but the official build documentation uses Apple clang, which doesn't bundle OpenMP. So either the documentation needs to reflect that say a non Apple clang from brew needs to be used, or the build process should use be updated to be able to use the libomp library together with Apple clang.

body: @soumith  Yes, but the official build documentation uses Apple clang, which doesn't bundle OpenMP. So either the documentation needs to reflect that say a non Apple clang from brew needs to be used, or the build process should use be updated to be able to use the libomp library together with Apple clang.
